column5: The whole North shore of the Western Basin Of Lake Erie has started up from the mouth of the Detroit River to Bells point just West of Leamington. Worm Harnesses and Drift Rigs are the ticket colors Copper, Gold & Orange, & RDP are the best. Fish are in from 14 to 24' if you need information on the area give me a call 1-519-733-3184 or eamil me at [email protected] Looks like it's going to be another Great season.
